dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Mayor Bob wanted to talk to you.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: Whats he like?

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: I think he's a bit weird, so be careful

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: Tom said you wanted to talk to me.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Hello there, I wanted to welcome you to our little town.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Say hi to Tom for me!

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: What did he want?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: He just wanted to welcome me to the town.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Like I said, hes weird

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Have you met Bill the Bartender?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: No, should I?

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Do you have anything better to do?

steps.objective: Introduce yourself to Bill the Bartender.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: Tom wanted me to introduce myself.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Tom is just a lazy man, but its nice to meet you.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: Thanks... I guess

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: I need to give the mayor 5 gold, a watch and this flag.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Can you bring them for me?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: I suppose I could do that.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Thank you, you're a life saver!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: Hello Mayor Bob.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.line: The shopkeeper asked me to bring you these things

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: Well thank you very much!

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: We don't get enough nice folk like you around these parts.

dialogue.speaker: npc
dialogue.line: let me know if you need anything.
